EmailTemplate.subject: CANCELLED: UBM Session
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey there {!Contact.Name},
This is just a quick email to confirm you have been offered a space at the CV and Interview workshop at UBM!
This is a fantastic and hugely popular workshop which will include sessions on CV writing, cover letters and a mock interview with a range of professionals in the events and marketing industry!
Here is some more information for you:
When: Tuesday 16th of February between 09:15 and 16:30.
Where: UBM, 240 Blackfriars Road, London, SE1 8BF.
Please bring along a copy of your CV and cover letter, and if you have one a laptop so you can edit at the event. We will be providing a few on the day as well.
Lunch will not be provided so please do bring a packed lunch or money (there is a Pret and a McDonalds nearby).
Dress code is smart casual
I will send another email closer to the event but in the meantime do let me know if you have any questions and if can no longer attend so I can offer you place to another young person.
I look forward to seeing you,
Rhiannon
Graduate Associate Manager 07876836445
